price: Na mmom sε ͻka wͻn a wͻpo nokorԑ, ayerafoͻ no ho nso a,
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna mina al-mukadhibīna al-ḍālīna
